name: 2022 IEEE the 18th Asia Pacific Conference on Circuits and Systems (IEEE APCCAS 2022)
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore subject to meeting IEEE Xplore's scope and quality requirements. Selected papers will be invited to submit extended full papers to IEEE Transaction on Circuits and Systems I (TCAS-I) and IEEE Transaction on Circuits and Systems II (TCAS-II).
